title: Ivan Davidov
text:
Ivan Aleksandrov Davidov (; 5 October 1943 – 19 February 2015) was a <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Bulgaria%20national%20football%20team">Bulgaria</a> in the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966</a> and <a href="1970%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1970 FIFA World Cup</a>s. He also played for <a href="PFC%20Slavia%20Sofia">PFC Slavia Sofia</a>.
Career.
Davidov started his career at the age of 16 with <a href="Spartak%20Sofia">Spartak Sofia</a>, before he moved to <a href="PFC%20Slavia%20Sofia">Slavia Sofia</a> in 1962. He spent 10 seasons of his career at Slavia, before retiring at the age of 29 in 1971. He died in 2015.
